about.desc: Keep track, edit and export clock-in and clock-out times.

signin.nameverification: Name must be between 1 and 100 characters.
signin.usernameverification: Username must have between 1 and 10 characters and only contain letters, numbers, - or _.
signin.passwordverification: Password must be between 8 and 32 characters and inlude at least one uppercase, lowercase, number and special character.
